node.title: Slave or Free?
node.description: The Bible is a book about freedom. Just look at the story of the Exodus, the year of Jubilee, and the ministry of Jesus who came to set the captives free. Without a doubt, truth is liberating. But does responsibility come with this freedom we have found in Christ, and if so, what does that look like? Is the Christian experience one of servitude or are we truly free? Find out in this important message with Pastor Chris Buttery.
